modName: DXT compression error female nose and face normal map pixel
summary:

descriptionHtml:
DXT compression error female nose and face normal map pixel FIX 

This texture is corrected and fixed to remove the compression artifacts on the tip of the female nose. (Its strange that they used the DDS DXT 1 compression on such important textures, what is the point of doing all artwork in high resolution just do then break it with a bad compression and a to low resolution. Use DXT 5 !!!)

Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\femalehead_msn.dds
author: fedraterra
